etymology.interpretation: 济南(濟南) (Jǐnán) refers to a location that historically provided aid or facilitated transportation, situated to the south. The city of Jinan, the capital of Shandong Province, is significant historically as a hub of trade and communication.
etymology.simplification: 济南 is the simplified form of 濟南.

examples.chinese: 我计划明年去济南(我計劃明年去濟南)，在那里品尝美食(在那裡品嚐美食)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jìhuà míngnián qù Jǐnán, zài nàlǐ pǐncháng měishí.
examples.english: I plan to visit Jinan next year, where I will taste delicious food.

examples.chinese: 济南有着丰富的历史(濟南有著豐富的歷史)。
